Text: Shoelace gets her seasons mixed up. Season 04 is actually 05 due to a computational error in her head. We luv u anyway shoelaces because you deliver the show, even if we do have to rename it because of you mistaking a 4 for a 5.

the only error being made is by you gayfleabag.The Untucked show didn't air during the 1st season of the main show and is therefore always one season behind.Don't believe me? read this!
https://itunes.apple.com/us/tv-season/rupauls-drag-race-untucked!/id593152706
Yeah, Untucked is one season behind, although that still confuses me. But anyway, thaaaaaanks, ShoReleases!!!
I always rename the untuckeds to the right season. too confusing otherwise. itunes is for losers.

While I don't agree that Shoelace is wrong, I do agree that it's kind of dumb to number it a season behind. Because would anybody really just go out and buy season x of untucked on its own? They really should be packaged together on iTunes as well.
